snippet: Luol Deng’s layup with 3.7 seconds to play lifted the host Chicago Bulls to a 76-74 victory over the Atlanta Hawks on Monday night.
abstract: Chicago Bulls defeat Atlanta Hawks, 76-74; other NBA results noted.
lead_paragraph: Luol Deng’s layup with 3.7 seconds to play lifted the host Chicago Bulls to a 76-74 victory over the Atlanta Hawks on Monday night.

headline.main: Bulls Push Past Hawks on Layup in Final Seconds
headline.print_headline: Bulls Push Past Hawks On Layup in Final Seconds
